title: PMD Products Pneumatic Spark Plug Cleaner Sand Blaster w/Abrasive
features: 2 Position cleaning, position 1 for rigorous abrasive cleaning and position 2 for air blow-off
Mounting flange to attach to workbench, All Metal Construction
1/4" NPT inlet, recommended 90 PSI, Air consumption 7.7 CFM
Use to remove performance hindering carbon build up from spark plugs, Works with all spark plug types and sizes
description: INCLUDES ABRASIVE MATERIAL * Connect tool to your air source through air adapter (included), insert spark plug in end, push blaster button for a few seconds, and remove cleaned spark plug * 2 Position cleaning, position 1 for rigorous abrasive cleaning and position 2 for air blow-off * Mounting flange to attach to workbench * Brass air adapter included * Blaster removes carbon build up on plugs, or will thoroughly dry a flooded plug (blow-off mode) * Air consumption 7.7 CFM * 3/8" hose recommended use * 1/4" NPT inlet, recommended 90 PSI * Works with all spark plug types and sizes Overall dimensions: 8-1/16" L x 2-9/16" W x 3/4" diameter
